text: For every minute you remain angry, you give up sixty seconds of peace of mind.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

text: Let us more and more insist on raising funds of love, of kindness, of understanding, of peace. Money will come if we seek first the Kingdom of God - the rest will be given.
author: Mother Teresa

text: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
author: Dalai Lama

text: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

text: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the postive affirmation of peace.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
